channel.title: QRky Changelog
channel.description: Stay updated with the latest improvements and features for QRky - The Professional QR Code Generator.

item.title: v2.0.0 - Major 2026 Update
item.description:
• Architecture Update: Migrated to client-side routing for faster navigation.
  • Visual Overhaul: Complete redesign with premium glassmorphism aesthetics, soft shadows, and smooth animations.
  • Responsive Fixes: Solved card spacing issues on narrow monitors and optimized mobile layout.
  • Documentation: Updated comprehensive guides and added RSS feed support.

item.title: v1.1.0 - Usability Improvements
item.description: UI polish, code cleanup, and added usage instructions.

item.title: v1.0.0 - Initial Release
item.description: Initial launch of QRky with real-time preview, customization options, and WCAG accessibility analysis.
